code: import{AXIOS}from'./endpoints';export function readWiFiStatus(){return AXIOS.get('/wifiStatus');}export function scanNetworks(){return AXIOS.get('/scanNetworks');}export function listNetworks(){return AXIOS.get('/listNetworks');}export function readWiFiSettings(){return AXIOS.get('/wifiSettings');}export function updateWiFiSettings(wifiSettings){return AXIOS.post('/wifiSettings',wifiSettings);}
